badwords.details: Please note that when adding new words to your server's filter you overwrite all your currently set words!
badwords.action: **Action:** Bad words filter has been OPTION
badwords.words: **Words:** Bad words have been set to WORDS
badwords.notice: **Notice:** Be sure to enable the general automod toggle with the PREFIXautomod command

duptext.details:
Uses the Levenshtein Distance Algorithm to determine similarity.
If the distance is less than 10 the messages are considered duplicate.
You can specify the minutes within messages should be checked (defaults to 3),
the amount of allowed similar messages (defaults to 2) and the Levenshtein distance (defaults to 20)

invitesfilter.description: Toggle the Discord server invites filter

chips.description: Retrieves your current balance for the casino

coin.description: Gamble your chips in a coin flip

daily.description: Receive your daily cash top up of 300 chips

leaderboard.description: Shows the top 5 ranking players for your server

memberbalance.description: Retrieves the amount of chips another member has for the casino

slots.description: Gamble your chips at the slot machine

weekly.description: Receive your weekly cash top up of 2000 chips

wheeloffortune.description: Gamble your chips iat the wheel of fortune

oxr.details: Makes use of ISO 4217 standard currency codes (see list here: <https://docs.openexchangerates.org/docs/supported-currencies>)

docs.description: Gets info from something in the DJS docs

mdn.description: Responds with JS documentation pulled from Mozilla Developer Network

yarn.description: Responds with information on a NodeJS package using the Yarn package registry

activity.description: Gets the activity (presence) data from a member
